imdb.plot outline: The series was first aired on 23 July 2008 and finished after episode 35 on 28 July 2011. In traditional "Soap Opera" style, the show followed the ups and downs of the good folk of Badgers Wood. A stage version of the show was performed at the Camden Fringe in 2009.
imdb.title: Pantry Galore
plot: Set at the Atalantta Boutique, this series tells the story of the inhabitants of Badgers Wood.::Paul Gerard Kennedy

The series was first aired on 23 July 2008 and finished after episode 35 on 28 July 2011. In traditional "Soap Opera" style, the show followed the ups and downs of the good folk of Badgers Wood. A stage version of the show was performed at the Camden Fringe in 2009.::Paul Gerard Kennedy
